mapper.select: SELECT member_num FROM member WHERE member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop (member_num,shop_name, category_name1, category_name2,state, shop_info, shop_pic,gps_y,gps_x) VALUES(#{member_num},#{shop_name},#{category_name1},#{category_name2},1, #{shop_info}, #{shop_pic}, #{gps_y}, #{gps_x})
mapper.update: UPDATE shop SET state = #{state} WHERE shop_name =#{shop_name}
mapper.select: SELECT *, ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(#{gps_y},#{gps_x}), POINT(gps_y,gps_x) ) AS dist FROM shop WHERE ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(#{gps_y},#{gps_x}), POINT(gps_y,gps_x) ) <5000 AND state =1 ORDER BY dist LIMIT #{request_ctn},2
SELECT shop_name FROM shop where shop_name = #{shop_name}
